wiki.content:
Hayley Williams wrote this song for her friend who committed suicide. [citation needed]

wiki.summary: Hayley Williams wrote this song for her friend who committed suicide.

track.name: When It Rains
comments: my favorite song from them e v e r.
One of my favorite Paramore tracks.
"Hayley Williams wrote this song for her friend who committed suicide." Oh , I've just seen it, yes it is about suicide, I liked it.
glad to see many straight guys listening to this! me no likey
this song makes me feel so nostalgic and i dont know why.  [2]
When it rains - sounds like she wrote this song here in Wales.
